name: AfterDark Screensaver "Flying Toasters" Demake for Gameboy Color
name_original: AfterDark Screensaver "Flying Toasters" Demake for Gameboy Color
description:
A somewhat faithful demake of the AfterDark screensaver "Flying Toasters" screensaver, made for the Gameboy Color.

(The fading effect can't be helped, it's a hardware limitation of the Gameboy.)
